posts.post_content:
Greetings all!

I am eagerly in the market for the 1887 N284 Buchner Gold Coin Jim O'Rourke "Hands on Thighs" card.

I know that the Buchners are relatively obscure, but if anyone knows N284s, it's this group.

So, if you have one, let's talk! If you know someone who has one, let's talk!

Thanks in advance. -- Rick
Hi Rick, sending you a pm
Thanks! I replied back to you.
Card was located and is en route to me! Thanks, Jim!!! Thanks, Net54!!!
